pages.privacy-policy: PastaFiesta Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters PastaFiesta HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to PastaFiesta's Privacy Policy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect When you visit our website, we may collect certain information, including: Information provided voluntarily by you, such as when you fill out forms or contact us. Automatically collected information, including your IP address, browser type, and device information. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: To provide and maintain our website. To improve our website and services. To personalize your experience and deliver relevant content. To communicate with you, including responding to inquiries and providing updates. Information Disclosure We may disclose your information in certain circumstances, including: To comply with legal obligations. To protect and defend our rights or property. With your consent or at your direction. Data Security We take appropriate measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your Rights You have the right to: Access, update, or delete your personal information. Object to the processing of your personal information. Withdraw your consent for processing your personal information. The PastaFiesta website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
